mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cmntor_lang (cmntor_no, lang_cd, etc_lang, grade) VALUES (#{cmntor_no}, #{lang_cd}, #{etc_lang}, #{grade})
mapper.select: SELECT cc.cmntor_no, name, birth_dt, gender, eng_name, eng_name2, arrg_place, cc.rgst_dt, act_yn, act_prt_cd, (select act_prt_nm from act_prt ap where ap.act_prt_cd = cc.act_prt_cd) as act_prt_nm, sido_cd, (select sido_cd_nm from sido s where cc.sido_cd = s.sido_cd) as sido_cd_nm, gugun_cd, last_edu_cd, case last_edu_cd when '01' then '안받음' when '02' then '초등학교' when '03' then '중학교' when '04' then '고등학교' when '05' then '대학교' when '06' then '대학교(4년제미만)' when '07' then '대학교(4년제이상)' when '08' then '대학원 석사' when '09' then '대학원 박사' else '' end as last_edu_nm, home_zip, home_addr1, home_addr2, home_phone, hand_phone, email, arrg_place, hope_place, prfl_img, job, case job when '01' then '자영업' when '02' then '판매/영업' when '03' then '기능/작업' when '04' then '사무/기술' when '05' then '경영/관리' when '06' then '자유/관리' when '07' then '농/임/어/축산업' when '08' then '전업주부' when '09' then '학생' when '10' then '무직' when '11' then concat('기타','(', etc_job_nm,')' ) else '' end job_nm, etc_job_nm, eng_test_yy, eng_test_nm, eng_test_pnt, chn_test_yy, chn_test_nm, chn_test_pnt, jpn_test_yy, jpn_test_nm, jpn_test_pnt, etc_lang_nm, etc_test_yy, etc_test_nm, etc_test_pnt, (select gugun_cd_nm from gugun g where cc.gugun_cd = g.gugun_cd) as gugun_cd_nm, bs.lang_nm, SUBSTRING_INDEX(home_phone,'-',1) as home_ph1, SUBSTRING_INDEX(substr(home_phone, instr(home_phone,'-')+1, length(home_phone)),'-',1) as home_ph2, SUBSTRING_INDEX(home_phone,'-',-1) as home_ph3, SUBSTRING_INDEX(hand_phone,'-',1) as hand_ph1, SUBSTRING_INDEX(substr(hand_phone, instr(hand_phone,'-')+1, length(hand_phone)),'-',1) as hand_ph2, SUBSTRING_INDEX(hand_phone,'-',-1) as hand_ph3, SUBSTRING_INDEX(email,'@',1) as email1, SUBSTRING_INDEX(email,'@',-1) as email2, case when substr(birth_dt,1,2) in ('19','20') then substr(now(),1,4) - substr(birth_dt,1,4) + 1 else '' end age, (select max(id) from user u where cc.cmntor_no = u.cmntor_no) as id FROM cmntor cc join (select c.cmntor_no, group_concat(case when l.lang_cd = '09' then concat(l.etc_lang, '(', ifnull(l.grade, ''),')') else concat(la.lang_nm, '(',ifnull(l.grade, ''),')' ) end order by la.lang_cd separator '/' ) as lang_nm from cmntor c left join cmntor_lang l on c.cmntor_no = l.cmntor_no left join lang la on l.lang_cd = la.lang_cd WHERE c.cmntor_no = #{cmntor_no} ) bs on cc.cmntor_no = bs.cmntor_no

SELECT cmntor_no, max(case when lang_cd = '01' then lang_cd else '' end) as lang_cd1, max(case when lang_cd = '02' then lang_cd else '' end) as lang_cd2, max(case when lang_cd = '02' then grade else '' end) as lang_cd2_grade, max(case when lang_cd = '03' then lang_cd else '' end) as lang_cd3, max(case when lang_cd = '03' then grade else '' end) as lang_cd3_grade, max(case when lang_cd = '04' then lang_cd else '' end) as lang_cd4, max(case when lang_cd = '04' then grade else '' end) as lang_cd4_grade, max(case when lang_cd = '09' then lang_cd else '' end) as lang_cd9, max(case when lang_cd = '09' then grade else '' end) as lang_cd9_grade, max(case when lang_cd = '09' then etc_lang else '' end) as etc_lang FROM cmntor_lang where cmntor_no = #{cmntor_no} group by cmntor_no
mapper.update: UPDATE cmntor SET del_yn = 'Y' WHERE cmntor_no = #{cmntor_no}
mapper.select: SELECT count(*) as cnt FROM ( SELECT cmntor_no, edu_seq, edu_prt, case when edu_prt = '1' then '신규' when edu_prt='2' then '보수' end as edu_prt_nm, yyyy, edu_place, edu_tm, edu_cmpl FROM edu_cmpl_hist WHERE cmntor_no = #{cmntor_no} ) tt

select bs.* from ( SELECT @rownum:=@rownum+1 as row_num, tt.* FROM ( SELECT cmntor_no, edu_seq, edu_prt, case when edu_prt = '1' then '신규' when edu_prt='2' then '보수' end as edu_prt_nm, yyyy, edu_place, edu_nm, edu_tm, edu_cmpl FROM edu_cmpl_hist WHERE cmntor_no = #{cmntor_no} ) tt , (select @rownum:=0) tmp ORDER BY edu_seq ) bs order by row_num desc limit #{startRow}, #{endRow}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO edu_cmpl_hist (cmntor_no, edu_seq, edu_prt, yyyy, edu_place, edu_nm, edu_tm, edu_cmpl) SELECT #{cmntor_no}, ifnull( (SELECT max(edu_seq)+1 FROM edu_cmpl_hist WHERE cmntor_no = #{cmntor_no}), 1), #{edu_prt}, #{yyyy}, #{edu_place}, #{edu_nm}, #{edu_tm}, #{edu_cmpl}
mapper.select: SELECT count(*) as cnt FROM ( SELECT cmntor_no, seq, work_ym, work_tm, work_dt_cnt, work_place, visitor_cnt, cmmt_cnt FROM act_hist WHERE cmntor_no = #{cmntor_no} ) tt

select bs.* from ( SELECT @rownum:=@rownum+1 as row_num, tt.* FROM ( SELECT cmntor_no, seq, case when length(work_ym) > 0 then concat(substr(work_ym,1,4), '년 ', substr(work_ym,6,7), '월') end as work_ym, work_tm, work_dt_cnt, work_place, visitor_cnt, cmmt_cnt FROM act_hist WHERE cmntor_no = #{cmntor_no} ) tt , (select @rownum:=0) tmp ORDER BY work_ym ) bs order by row_num desc limit #{startRow}, #{endRow}
mapper.update: UPDATE act_hist SET work_tm = #{work_tm}, work_dt_cnt = #{work_dt_cnt}, work_place = #{work_place}, visitor_cnt = #{visitor_cnt}, cmmt_cnt = #{cmmt_cnt}, upt_id = #{id}, upt_tm = now() WHERE cmntor_no = #{cmntor_no} AND seq = #{seq}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO act_hist (cmntor_no, seq, work_ym, work_tm, work_dt_cnt, work_place, visitor_cnt, cmmt_cnt, reg_id, reg_tm, upt_id, upt_tm) SELECT #{cmntor_no}, ifnull( (SELECT max(seq)+1 FROM act_hist WHERE cmntor_no = #{cmntor_no}), 1), #{work_ym}, #{work_tm}, #{work_dt_cnt}, #{work_place}, #{visitor_cnt}, #{cmmt_cnt}, #{id}, now(), #{id}, now()
